definition: at the base/at the root/(of a leg) just below the crutch
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)

sentences.english: What becomes of the handful of leaves from the young tree which is sawed off at the root?
sentences.chinese: 一棵年輕的樹被大齊根鋸了，它的一撮嫩葉怎樣了呢？

sentences.english: The crop ripened, and the peasant went into the field and cut the full stalks off at ground level.
sentences.chinese: 麥子熟了，他來到田間，把麥稈齊根割倒在地。
